message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it!  I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
Thanks for the offer Bob, I appreciate you're trying to get a good deal. I'm willing to go down to $95, but I can't go any lower than that.  What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $95 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and meet at $90?
